Interface AbstractCrudService<DataType>

Type Parameters:

All Known Subinterfaces:
DynamicFinder<DataType,InformerType>, FinderCrudService<DataType,InformerType>, IdBasedService<DataType>, InViewService<DataType,InformerType,FocusType>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFinderService
public interface AbstractCrudService<DataType>

Base for various implementation of crudity providers, it defines the common behaviours.

Author:
ndx
